code: import React from"react";import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import Navbar from"../Components/navbar";import Footer from"../Components/footer";import photo2 from"../assets/Verisk.jpg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DetailsPage=()=>{const{state}=useLocation();if(!state)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-center py-20",children:"No data found."});const imageToShow=photo2;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-900 min-h-screen py-16 px-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-xl shadow-lg p-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-bold text-gray-800 dark:text-white mb-4",children:state.title||state.degree}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-lg text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300 mb-2",children:[state.organization||state.institution," (",state.year,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-4",children:state.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageToShow,alt:"Training/Education",className:"rounded-lg mt-4 w-full object-cover max-h-[900px]"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default DetailsPage;
